name: Comparative Inference of COVID-19 Vaccine Efficacy
alt: Bayesian vs Frequentist Vaccine Efficacy Comparison
description: Comparing Frequentist and Bayesian Approach to get the vaccine efficacy of BNT162b2. Based off study by New England Journal of Medicine
authors: Justin Mai, Casey Lazik, Harry Schuckman

name: Modern Salary Prediction Project
description: Supporting modern job seekers understand job logistics by (1) Finding the best predictors to optimize model (2) Use model to predict salaries by splitting data
authors: Justin Mai, Troy Russo, Isaac Muhlestein, Conan Li, Jian Kang

name: FinanceU: Spending Habit Tracker / Savings App
description: A hackathon app that utilizes live updating data visualizations to help teach concepts like investing and compound interest
authors: Justin Mai, Christian Chung, Tristan Khieu

name: Seattle Housing Market Analysis
description: Help navigate the housing market in Seattle by understanding the key variables that impacts sales value, based off FRED and Zillow data
